name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadRadar: Discover Books on Any Website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly detect and explore books mentioned on any webpage. Access titles, summaries, ratings, and reviews with ReadRadar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the books hidden within every webpage you browse!

ReadRadar is the ultimate Chrome extension for book lovers, avid readers, students, and researchers. Instantly identify all books mentioned on any website and dive deep into detailed information, including summaries, author details, ratings, reviews, and purchasing options.

üìö Key Features:

Instant Book Detection: Quickly scan any webpage, article, or blog post to find all referenced books.
Comprehensive Book Details: Access titles, cover images, descriptions, plot summaries, author bios, ratings, and reader reviews.
User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a clean and intuitive design.
One-Click Exploration: Seamlessly connect to more information or buy the books that intrigue you.
Personalized Book Discovery: Enhance your reading journey by uncovering new books aligned with your interests.

üîç Who Is This For?
Book Enthusiasts: Discover new reads while surfing the web.
Students & Researchers: Easily access book references and summaries for academic work.
Book Clubs: Find and share books mentioned online with your group.
Casual Readers: Learn more about books you stumble upon on any site.

üöÄ How to Use ReadRadar:
Install ReadRadar from the Chrome Web Store.
Browse any website, news article, or blog that references books.
Click the ReadRadar icon in your Chrome toolbar.
View a curated list of all books detected on the page.
